{"settings":"{
    // 1.java-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------->
    "java.jdt.ls.java.home": "C:\\JUNGHO\\2.JAVA\\3.jdk17",
    "java.eclipse.downloadSources": true,
    "java.import.generatesMetadataFilesAtProjectRoot": true,
    "java.maven.downloadSources": true,
    "java.project.encoding": "setDefault",
    "java.configuration.runtimes": [
        {
            "name": "JavaSE-17",
            "path": "C:\\JUNGHO\\2.JAVA\\3.jdk17",
            "default": true
        }
    ],

    // 2.editor------------------------------------------------------------------------------------>
    "editor.fontFamily": "D2Coding ligature",
    "editor.tabSize": 2,
    "editor.inlayHints.enabled": "off",
    "editor.codeLensFontFamily": "D2Coding ligature",
    "editor.inlayHints.fontFamily": "D2Coding ligature",
    "editor.minimap.enabled": false,
    "editor.renderWhitespace": "none",
    "editor.rulers": [100],
    "editor.minimap.maxColumn": 100,
    "editor.wordWrapColumn": 100,
    "editor.wordWrap": "wordWrapColumn",
    "editor.folding": false,
    "editor.showFoldingControls": "never",
    "editor.comments.insertSpace": false,
    "editor.tokenColorCustomizations": {
        "comments": "#FFFF00",
    },
    "github.copilot.enable": {
        "*": true,
        "yaml": true,
        "plaintext": true,
        "markdown": true,
    },

    // 3.explorer---------------------------------------------------------------------------------->
    "explorer.confirmDelete": false,
    "explorer.confirmDragAndDrop": false,
    "explorer.compactFolders": false,

    // 4.workbench--------------------------------------------------------------------------------->
    "workbench.startupEditor": "none",
    "workbench.iconTheme": "material-icon-theme",
    "highlight-matching-tag.enabled" : true,
    "workbench.editorAssociations": {
        "*.class": "default"
    },
    "workbench.colorCustomizations": {
        "editorIndentGuide.activeBackground": "#ffff00",
        "editorIndentGuide.background": "#ffffff80",
        "editorBracketMatch.border": "#ffffff80",
        "editor.inlineSuggest.enabled": true,
        "editorCursor.foreground": "#ffff00",
        "terminalCursor.foreground": "#ffff00"
    },

    // 5.intelli----------------------------------------------------------------------------------->
    "vsintellicode.features.python.deepLearning": "enabled",
    "vsintellicode.modelDownloadPath": "C:\\JUNGHO\\10.Vscode\\Microsoft VS Code\\Intellisense",

    // 6.server------------------------------------------------------------------------------------>
    "rsp-ui.enableStartServerOnActivation": [
        {
            "id": "redhat.vscode-community-server-connector",
            "name": "Community Server Connector",
            "startOnActivation": true
        },
        {
            "id": "redhat.vscode-server-connector",
            "name": "Red Hat Server Connector",
            "startOnActivation": false
        }
    ],
    "rsp-ui.rsp.java.home": "C:\\JUNGHO\\2.JAVA\\3.jdk17",

    // 7.prettier---------------------------------------------------------------------------------->
    "prettier.configPath": "C:\\JUNGHO\\10.Vscode\\Microsoft VS Code\\prettier",
    "prettier.prettierPath": "C:\\JUNGHO\\10.Vscode\\Microsoft VS Code\\prettier",
    "prettier.printWidth": 80,
    "prettier.bracketSameLine": true,

    // 8.file-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------->
    "files.autoSave": "afterDelay",
    "files.autoGuessEncoding": true,
    "files.associations": {
        "*.jsp": "jsp",
        "*.html": "html"
    },

    // 0.cspell------------------------------------------------------------------------------------>
    "cSpell.language": "en,lorem,en-GB,en-US",
    "cSpell.numSuggestions": 4,
    "cSpell.suggestionMenuType": "quickFix",
    "cSpell.suggestionNumChanges": 4,
    "cSpell.userWords": [
        "bgcolor",
        "boardre",
        "Bytecode",
        "classpath",
        "classpathentry",
        "colspan",
        "crtl",
        "dbcp",
        "dbpw",
        "imgs",
        "intelephense",
        "intelli",
        "javascriptlet",
        "javax",
        "jdbc",
        "jinja",
        "JUNGHO",
        "mailupload",
        "mydb",
        "mypadb",
        "mysql",
        "myutil",
        "nate",
        "println",
        "pstmt",
        "readcount",
        "regdate",
        "Regdate",
        "runtimes",
        "savepath",
        "Servlet",
        "servlets",
        "sonarlint",
        "stylesheet",
        "tabnine",
        "varchar",
        "vmargs",
        "vsintellicode",
        "wdate",
        "Writedate"
    ],
    "cSpell.enableFiletypes": [
        "Log",
        "bat",
        "bibtex",
        "clojure",
        "code-runner-output",
        "code-text-binary",
        "coffeescript",
        "cpp_embedded_latex",
        "cuda-cpp",
        "dart",
        "diff",
        "dockercompose",
        "dockerfile",
        "dtd",
        "fsharp",
        "git-rebase",
        "groovy",
        "hlsl",
        "ignore",
        "ini",
        "java-properties",
        "jsp",
        "jsx-tags",
        "julia",
        "juliamarkdown",
        "log",
        "lua",
        "makefile",
        "markdown-math",
        "markdown_latex_combined",
        "objective-c",
        "objective-cpp",
        "perl",
        "perl6",
        "powershell",
        "properties",
        "r",
        "razor",
        "rnc",
        "ruby",
        "search-result",
        "shaderlab",
        "shellscript",
        "sql",
        "tailwindcss",
        "tex",
        "vb",
        "xml",
        "xquery",
        "xsl"
    ],

    // 0.highlight--------------------------------------------------------------------------------->
    "highlight-matching-tag.highlightFromContent": true,
    "highlight-matching-tag.highlightSelfClosing": true,
    "highlight-matching-tag.styles": {
        "opening": {
            "name": {"underline": "yellow"},
            "right": {"underline": "yellow"},
            "left": {"underline": "yellow"},
            "full": {"underline": "yellow"}
        },
        "closing": {
            "name": {"underline": "yellow"},
            "right": {"underline": "yellow"},
            "left": {"underline": "yellow"},
            "full": {"underline": "yellow"}
        },
        "inner": {
            "name": {"underline": "yellow"},
            "right": {"underline": "yellow"},
            "left": {"underline": "yellow"},
            "full": {"underline": "yellow"}
        }
    },

    // 0.translate--------------------------------------------------------------------------------->
    "commentTranslate.hover.content": true,
    "commentTranslate.targetLanguage": "ko",
    "commentTranslate.ignore": [
        {
            "languageId": "javascript,typescript,javascriptreact,typescriptreact",
            "regular": "[\\*\\s]+"
        },
        {
            "languageId": "dart",
            "regular": "[\\s|/]+"
        }
    ],

    // 0.etc--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------->
    "redhat.telemetry.enabled": true,
    "audioCues.onDebugBreak": "off",
    "debug.javascript.autoAttachFilter": "smart",
    "[xml]": {"editor.defaultFormatter": "DotJoshJohnson.xml"},
    "terminal.integrated.fontSize": 14,
    "intellicodeCompletions.loggingLevel": "INFO",
    "tailwindCSS.rootFontSize": 14,
    "notebook.showFoldingControls": "never",
    "[jsonc]": {
        "editor.defaultFormatter": "esbenp.prettier-vscode"
    },

    "eslint.alwaysShowStatus": true,
    "eslint.lintTask.enable": true,
    "eslint.probe": [
        "javascript",
        "javascriptreact",
        "typescript",
        "typescriptreact",
        "html",
        "vue",
        "markdown",
        "json",
        "xml",
        "jsp",
        "java"
    ],

    "sonarlint.pathToNodeExecutable": "C:\\JUNGHO\\5.Nodejs\\node.exe",
    "sonarlint.ls.javaHome": "C:\\JUNGHO\\2.JAVA\\3.jdk17",
    "sonarlint.ls.vmargs": "-Xmx1024m",
    "sonarlint.output.showAnalyzerLogs": true,
    "sonarlint.trace.server": "off",
    "html.format.templating": true,
    "cSpell.caseSensitive": true,
    "cSpell.showAutocompleteSuggestions": true,
    
    "settingsSync.ignoredExtensions": [
        "redhat.vscode-yaml"
    ],
    "editor.inlineSuggest.enabled": true,
    "github.copilot.advanced": {
        "inlineSuggestCount": 5
    },
    "editor.suggestSelection": "first",
    "vsintellicode.modify.editor.suggestSelection": "choseToUpdateConfiguration",
    "sonarlint.rules": {
        "java:S106": {
            "level": "off"
        },
        "Web:S5254": {
            "level": "off"
        },
        "Web:DoctypePresenceCheck": {
            "level": "off"
        },
        "Web:TableWithoutCaptionCheck": {
            "level": "off"
        },
        "Web:S5256": {
            "level": "off"
        },
        "java:S112": {
            "level": "off"
        },
        "java:S108": {
            "level": "off"
        }
    },
    "[html]": {
        "editor.defaultFormatter": "vscode.html-language-features"
    },
    "editor.fontLigatures": true,
    "auto-close-tag.activationOnLanguage": [
        "jsf",
        "html",
        "jsp",
        "java",
        "xml",
        "php",
        "blade",
        "ejs",
        "jinja",
        "javascript",
        "javascriptreact",
        "typescript",
        "typescriptreact",
        "plaintext",
        "markdown",
        "vue",
        "liquid",
        "erb",
        "lang-cfml",
        "cfml",
        "HTML (EEx)",
        "HTML (Eex)",
        "plist"
    ],
    "security.workspace.trust.untrustedFiles": "open",
    "editor.cursorWidth": 1,
    "editor.quickSuggestions": {
        "other": true,
        "comments": true,
        "strings": true
    },
    "workbench.editor.enablePreview": false,
    "editor.tabCompletion": "on",
    "workbench.editor.wrapTabs": true,
    "prettier.useTabs": true,
    "zenMode.hideTabs": false,
    "editor.acceptSuggestionOnEnter": "smart",
    "editor.stickyScroll.enabled": true,
    "sync.autoUpload": true,
    "sync.removeExtensions": false,
    "sync.syncExtensions": false,
    "sync.autoDownload": true,
    "sync.gist": "46fe6f5e8112bc8cd7a2e50d15b28830",
}"}
